channel.title: Buy X Amount help
channel.description:
Ok I wanted to make a Buy X amount for my shops in my server. I followed this tut: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,289834.0.html And that is based off of only a 10k limit of buying items. If someone is willing to do for me I would appreciate if they did 1k limit.
My Server's source is Project Czar. I was wondering if I sent my client.java to someone and they could do it for me. I tried and nothing happended when I did it.

item.title: Buy X Amount help
item.dc:creator: @bballman28 bballman28
item.description:
@bballman28 wrote:

I know that I did that, but it didn’t work after I did all of it. So I would asking if someone would do it for me.

My client.java: http://uppit.com/ZPKUPU

Read full topic

item.title: Buy X Amount help
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

else if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount <= 1000) buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else sendMessage("You cannot buy more than 1k items at a time."); }

Really easy?

Only had to remove a 0.

Read full topic
